SEARCH
Package dev.fernando.user_authentication_api.exception

Class RestExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
dev.fernando.user_authentication_api.exception.RestExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class RestExceptionHandler extends Object
Global exception handler for the user request the API. This class handles various exceptions that may occur during the execution of the application and returns appropriate HTTP responses with error messages.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Fernando Cruz Cavina

    • handleUserNotFound

      @ExceptionHandler(UserNotFoundException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageHandler> handleUserNotFound(UserNotFoundException ex)
      Handles UserNotFoundException and returns a 404 NOT FOUND response.
      Parameters:
      ex - the thrown UserNotFoundException
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a MessageHandler with NOT_FOUND status and error message
